beer.name: New World Porter
beer.description: A traditional black porter, with a surprise twist - it's dry-hopped!! We've expanded the porter category a bit, adding a delightful, dry hop aroma to blend with the sweet caramel and chocolate characteristics of a Robust Porter.
beer.grains: Two-row barley, Munich 10L, chocolate, black, caramel 120L
Two-row barley, Munich 10L, chocolate, black, caramel 120L
